I totaly agree with Dawg. There IS a message board for OOC purposes, you 
know. On it you can talk about anything dealing from actors, to Pokemon, to 
porn if you'd like, but SPARE THE REST OF US!!!!

By the way, the message board is at http://nbwrpg.tripod.com and then just 
follow the link to 'message board'.
